AIX initial configuration of SAN connected systems

  1. Configure FC SCSI attributes
    for FSCSI in $(lscfg | grep fscsi | awk '{print $2}' )
do
   sudo chdev -Pl ${FSCSI} -a fc_err_recov=fast_fail -a dyntrk=yes
done

Storage Array specific device drivers

  1. What type of operating system is this ?
    1. AIX
      1. What type of disks are we using on this LPAR ?
        1. vSCSI
          1. Do not install any device drivers
        2. NPIV
          1. Install storage array specific device drivers on AIX/VIOS
    2. VIOS
      1. What type of I/O virtualization are we planning to use on this frame/VIOS ?
        1. vSCSI
          1. Install storage array specific device drivers on AIX/VIOS
        2. NPIV
          1. Do not install any device drivers
